text:
Essentialism isn’t just about adding one more task to your plate; it’s a whole new way to approach everything. It’s a mindset shift. But getting into this mindset isn’t easy. We’re often pulled back into the trap of Nonessentialism (basically, doing too much). 

In this part of the book, we’ll tackle three common misconceptions of Nonessentialism and swap them out for truths about Essentialism. Get ready to rethink how you see your priorities!

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Essentialism is a mindset that prioritizes doing fewer things better, contrasting with the distractions of Nonessentialism.
